title: Soda Jerks at Action Lube
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A 1950's style diner complete with a soda fountain, jukebox and pinball - located within a full service garage. Has a separate vegan menu which includes desserts, and you could order in advance custom vegan cake. Drinks include smoothies, fruit sodas, and almond milk all served from the soda fountain. Free Wi-Fi. Could get your vehicle serviced while eating.
